author: dkhaywood
msg: fixing error in application archetype (to do with required properties)

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectAssociation method renames (isOptionEnabled -> hasChoices; isPersisted -> isNotDerived; renamed ResolveState.STANDALONE -> ResolveState.VALUE; made PersistenceSessionFactory cache whether isFixturesInstalled, original impl was breaking XML Object Store;introduced new AbstractPersistenceCommand to simplify writing object stores; tidied up InMemoryObjectStore commands also; fixed XmlObjectStore to support polymorphic (subtype) queries, and tidied up, and factored out its commands, also removed some unused methods in its internal DataManager

author: dkhaywood
msg: fixes (I hope) to the application archetype for the new Maven module names; have also introduced the use of archetype parameters to specify properties for core.version and plugins.html.version etc

author: dkhaywood
msg: plugins now building and passing its tests

author: dkhaywood
msg: core now building and passing its tests
